name: RocketX
description: RocketX is an oscilloscope-themed robot belonging to the WebtrES club. With its shiny black box and classic buttons, it stands out in any crowd. Its arms and legs are equipped with powerful rockets, allowing it to swiftly navigate any terrain. The classic screen provides clear and precise visual data analysis, while the fashionable shades add a touch of style. RocketX is a versatile and charismatic robot, ready to take on any challenge.
